pageProduct.name: Penta-vite Infant Drops 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Pentavite® Multivitamin Infant Liquid contains a combination of 7 vitamins to assist with the healthy growth and development of infants and children from 0 up to 3 years.

  • With Vitamins A, B2, C and D to support healthy growth and development.
  • With Vitamins A, B2, B6 and C to support healthy immune system function.
  • With Vitamins A, B1, B2, B3, B6, C and D to support general health and wellbeing.
  • No added sugar 
  • No added artificial colours  
  • No added preservatives 
  • No added dairy 
  • No added gluten 
  • No added fructose 
Dedicated to Children's Health

Suitable For: Infants 0-3 years.

Product Claims: Supports healthy growth and development

Size: 30mL

Dermatologist Tested?: n/a

Dermatologically Tested?: n/a

Soap-Free?: n/a

Skin Type: n/a

SPF: n/a

Alcohol Free?: No

KEY FEATURES

• Supports healthy growth and development
• Maintains healthy immune system function
• Supports vitamin levels in the body
• Supports general health and wellbeing

Warnings

Contains saccharin sodium.

Ingredients

Contains: Each 0.45 mL dose contains:
Vitamin A (from Retinol palmitate 714 microgram) 390 microgram RE
Vitamin B1 (as Thiamine hydrochloride) 540 microgram
Vitamin B2 (Riboflavine) (from riboflavine sodium phosphate 1.1 mg) 810 microgram
Vitamin B3 (Nicotinamide) 7.1 mg
Vitamin B6 (pyridoxine) (from pyridoxine hydrochloride 135 microgram) 111 microgram
Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) 42.8 mg
Vitamin D3 (colecalciferol) 10.1 microgram

Directions

Administer dose via syringe provided directly into infant's mouth or add to a teaspoon of milk or fruit juice. Rinse syringe when finished and allow to dry.

USAGE ADVICE

Do not shake. Use within 9 weeks of opening. Do not use if seal around cap is broken or missing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store upright below 25°C. Refrigerate after opening. Secure bottle cap tightly.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Please recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
